name: Atoms 2D
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Atoms2D is a platformer that focuses on growing your character by collecting "atoms." Collect all four and complete the final challenge to finish the game!  This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. A constructive rating and comment are greatly appreciated. Thank you for playing my game!

Accessibility: WASD, K, and L can be used as alternatives for Arrow Keys, Z, and X
